languages.en_US: X-Mas
languages.zh_TW: X-Mas

languages.en_US: Merry Christmas And Happy New Year!
languages.zh_TW: 聖誕節快樂和新年快樂!

languages.en_US: The Holidays Are Over! See you next year!
languages.zh_TW: 節日結束了! 明年見!

languages.en_US: Happy New Year to all of you, my friends!
languages.zh_TW: 我的朋友們, 祝你們新年快樂!

languages.en_US: Woosh! Press Right Mouse Button to let tree grow!
languages.zh_TW: 哇! 按滑鼠右鍵來讓樹長大!

languages.en_US: Required
languages.zh_TW: 需要

languages.en_US: Not enough place to make it grow
languages.zh_TW: 沒有足夠的地方讓它成長

languages.en_US: This tree has reached it's maximum level!
languages.zh_TW: 這棵樹已達到最大級別!

languages.en_US: Hey, do not be greedy! (Tree limit)
languages.zh_TW: 嘿, 別貪心! (已達到最大擁有上限)

languages.en_US: This miracle won't drop. Are you sure?
languages.zh_TW: 這個奇蹟將不會掉落. 你確定?

languages.en_US: Santa Claus sees everything.
languages.zh_TW: 聖誕老人看見了一切.

languages.en_US: To destroy a tree - cut the log.
languages.zh_TW: 摧毀一棵樹 - 砍原木.

languages.en_US: Are you sure? Your progress will be lost and no resources back.
languages.zh_TW: 你確定嗎? 你的進度將會遺失並且不會退回任何資源回來.

languages.en_US: To destroy your tree cut it again.
languages.zh_TW: 來摧毀你的樹, 請在砍一次.

languages.en_US: It's not your tree!
languages.zh_TW: 這不是你的樹!

languages.en_US: You're MONSTER!
languages.zh_TW: 你是個 怪物!

languages.en_US: Probably Santa has put you in blacklist. I hope you're lucky next time!
languages.zh_TW: 聖誕老人可能將你列入黑名單中. 我希望你下次能好運!

languages.en_US: Christmas Crystal
languages.zh_TW: 聖誕水晶

languages.en_US: Concentrated Christmas Spirit
languages.zh_TW: 聚集了聖誕節的精神

languages.en_US: Use it on Sapling to fill it with magic!
languages.zh_TW: 在樹苗上使用它來充滿魔法!

languages.en_US: Use /xmas to show plugin version and status
languages.zh_TW: 使用 /xmas 顯示插件版本與狀態

languages.en_US: Use /xmas give <Name> to give crystal somebody
languages.zh_TW: 使用 /xmas give <Name> 來給水晶

languages.en_US: Use /xmas gifts to spawn some presents under every Christmas Tree!
languages.zh_TW: 使用 /xmas gifts 在每棵聖誕樹下生成一些禮物!

languages.en_US: Use /xmas end to set plugin into ending mode
languages.zh_TW: 使用 /xmas end 將插件設定為結束模式

languages.en_US: &2Use &c/xmas &2to show plugin version and status
languages.zh_TW: &2使用 &c/xmas &2顯示插件版本與狀態

languages.en_US: &2Use &c/xmas give &2<Name> to give crystal somebody
languages.zh_TW: &2使用 &c/xmas give &2<Name> 來給水晶

languages.en_US: &2Use &c/xmas gifts &2to spawn some presents under trees!
languages.zh_TW: &2使用 &c/xmas gifts &2在每棵聖誕樹下生成一些禮物!

languages.en_US: &2Use &c/xmas end &2to set plugin into ending mode
languages.zh_TW: &2使用 &c/xmas end &2將插件設定為結束模式

languages.en_US: &cPlayer not found
languages.zh_TW: &c玩家未找到

languages.en_US: &6Missing player name
languages.zh_TW: &6缺少玩家名稱

languages.en_US: &cHo! &2Ho! &cHo! &3Looks like its time to check presents!
languages.zh_TW: &cHo! &2Ho! &cHo! &3看起來是時候檢查禮物了!
